MY FAVORITE GAME SINCE I BECOME A GAMER

Every time when I join a game after I accepted a match the game told me that I cannot join,so I have to go back to STEAM to check the game's files.It really makes me angry cause I usually don‘t have enough time to do all of these before the game starts.So i'm here to beg all the staffs to find the BUG and repair it as soon as possible.It could not be my computer's problem cause my 2 computers both met the problem.I always cannot join another game in a short time because I could not join the last game.Pls quickly repair the BUG,or I'm afraid that I wouldn't come back to play this game on STEAM.As I know,the same problem also happened on other players' computer however there's no problem on their PC.Pls reply me soon after you fix it.THX.


每次我玩竞技的时候总是会卡在连接至服务器那里，又要退出到STEAM去检验游戏完整性，然后下载一个10KB的文件，再下载一个microsoft的软件，经常导致我无法连接回游戏，冷却我的竞技时间，我真的服了。不可能是我电脑的问题，因为我两台电脑都这样。能不能请开发人员尽早修复呢？？？？？
Если не играть , то игра нормальная

Халявный 1$ или да же больше!
Сайт: https://clck.ru/HNiqT
Сайт легальный,без депозита,на Ютубе есть много роликов про него.
Проходишь по ссылке,логинешься через Стим,жмешь redeem code и вводишь ADMIRAL, после чего получаешь 1$ и можешь вывести без депозита,А в GIFT CODE ВВОДИШЬ FROMSTEAM .
Спасибо за внимание.
Если будут вопросы по сайту, я всегда отвечу

There has been an improvement in the anti-cheat over the past year for sure. Hackers are rare nowadays in silver/gold nova elo. The new skins are nice, and the missions let you enjoy the content you often would miss. : )

Many things could be said about our little family here in the cs community. I personally would rather keep those words to myself, not that I don't love you, I simply do not have the patience right now my mind is preoccupied by other things, needless to say the game is great and is free to play so well why not, worst thing that can happen is you run into me in a game and become somehow enlightened , maybe you meet new friends or maybe you don't you are probably an arse in that case.... hey I did not misspell arse, arse is a real word.... well stop picking your arse and play some arms race with me, don't forget to talk to strangers. Oyunu geliştirdiklerini sanarak gün geçtikçe batırıyorlar. 2015 deki CS-GO kalsaydı gözümdeki değeri düşmezdi. Git gide bütün haritaları oynandığı halde rekabetçiden kaldırıyorlar. Oynayan insanları sadece Dust 2, Cache ve Mirage oynamaya itiyorlar. Salak saçma güncellemeler getirip FPS düşürüyorlar, üstelik 1.5 neslinin vazgeçilmezi Assault gibi bi haritayı kaldırıp Overpass ya da daha kötüsü Agency gibi haritaları rekabetçide tutmaları saçmalık.
